pr_title: [RW-5606][risk=no] UI - update Concept Set List page(concept-set-details.tsx) with use of ConceptSet.criteriums list

timeline.bodyText: It won't let me comment on the actual line, but in the isConcept function below at line 168, we need to check if the source is 'conceptSetDetails' also. Currently, if you're on the detail page and try to search and add new concepts, it will get added to the criteria store and we get double criteria icons in the sidebar.
timeline.author: dolbeew

timeline.bodyText: I noticed this is called twice because it's getting called in concept-set-details component first, which stores the concept set in currentConceptSetStore. Maybe check if the the concept set in the store matches the csid in props before calling the api to avoid duplicate calls.
timeline.author: dolbeew

timeline.message: Survey As list and hierarchy should not have answer selectable

timeline.bodyText: I'm getting currentConcepts as undefined here when viewing a saved concept set, so there's an empty space where the table should be. Not sure why but seems like it doesn't get the updated store value when the concept set is loaded and set in concept-set-details.tsx.
timeline.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I got my stores mixed up and my last comment doesn't make sense. We need to set currentConceptStore for all domains in concept-set-details.tsx. Currently, it only gets set for surveys. (see suggestion in concept-set-details.tsx)
replies.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: Done and also i enclosed it within a flag check that i had forgotten to do before
replies.author: NehaBroad

timeline.author: dolbeew

timeline.message: Add check for flag and also set concept store for domain other than survey;
